Gold Saucer - Interrupted by Fireworks
Getting the Keystone A Meeting in Ghost Hotel A Date with Aerith :: Event Square - The Gondola A Date with Tifa :: Event Square - The Gondola A Date with Yuffie :: Event Square - The Gondola A Date with Barret :: The Gondola Cait Sith the Spy Leaving Gold Saucer
Cloud and the others pass through North Corel on their way to Gold Saucer. ManA buncha guys called Turks came here sayin' they'd pay 10000 gil for some rock called a 'Keystone'.When I asked how much they'd pay for a regular rock just layin' around here, they slapped me upside my damn head!! Man 2I'll never understand the rich. I heard some guy named Dio at the Gold Saucer is collectin' rocks! They take the Ropeway up to Gold Saucer. Fortune Telling Machine (at Wonder Square)What you are looking for is near. Cloud and the others make their way to Battle Square, which has by now reopened. ManI heard that this is the curator's favorite attraction. He likes it so much that he even has his collection displayed in the arena. WomanAre you here for the battle, too? Cloud- That's the idea- Not interested
That's the idea WomanI like fighters. But hate those who're all talk.
Not interested WomanIs that so.
Cloud continues on up the steps. Black-haired ManCrap! I still don't have enough points.Mmm? You're new here, aren't you? Then, you want an explanation of the Battle Arena? Cloud- Yeah- Not interested Black-haired ManYou fight here and collect battle points. You can then exchange those points for prizes.The Battle Game... even though it's a game you still use all your physical abilities. To participate, go to the front and pay yer GP's.You can fight in up to eight battles. The more you win, the more battle points you get.But, if you lose, you lose all your points. So it's up to you whether or not to fight after each win.They also make it harder by givin' out handicaps.They decide what handicaps there'll be, and you won't know what you're up against until the battle.Oh yeah, once you leave the Battle area, all your battle points will become useless. So watch it.Oh, and one other thing. The maximum points you could get is 65000, no more. So if you get that many you should exchange them for something. Large ManMaybe I could've made it a little further. It's so hard to know when to stop...Man, I knew I should've stopped. But it's so hard to stop... Man Practicing KicksI'm not going to lose this time!All right, it should be my turn comin' up here soon. Registration LadyHey, have you heard? Something awful happened!Two staff members and some Shinra soldiers were shot.The soldiers died instantly, but the staff survived. BarretDyne...... Registration LadyRegister for battle? The registration fee is 10 GP. Cloud- Let's do it- Not interested Staff PersonWhenever you come to the Gold Saucer, I recommend you visit the owner's museum at least once. Cloud enters Dio's Show Room. Various items rest on pedestals around the room, with plaques labeling them. Item Plaques"Star Cup""Weekend Clock""Laugh Sapling""Slayer's Pot""Chisa's Mask""Dio's Portrait""D Type Equipment""Zauger's Cup""Calling Gourd" In the center display is the Keystone. CloudIt's the Keystone... Dio enters from behind him. DioHeh, heh, heh. Long time no see, my boy. Hmm? You like that, huh? CloudCan you let me borrow this? DioHeh, heh, heh. Sorry, but it's not for rent.Hmm.Since you've been good to me in the past, I CAN let you have it on one condition. CloudOne condition? DioHeh, heh, heh. Entertain me! Cloud- What'd you want me to do?- Not in the mood
What'd you want me to do? DioHoo boy!Heh, heh, heh. It's not something that's really difficult.This is the Battle Arena. Show me your fighting skills. Just you, my boy. I'm expecting a good fight!
Not in the mood DioI see... Then let's pretend that this never happened.
When Cloud takes him up on the deal, he enters the Battle Arena.
If he completes all 8 battles... DioHeh, heh, heh! Well done, young man! All right, as I promised,you can take it. Oh, and I'll give you this too. Received "Protect Vest" Received "Choco Feather"!
If he does fairly well... DioHmm, you did pretty well, young man!Good, it's a promise, so go ahead and take it. I'll give this to you too. Received "Protect Vest"
If he does poorly... DioThat's the best you could do? Well, a promise is a promise. Go ahead, take it.
Received Key Item "Keystone"! DioWell then, we shall meet again! Heh, heh, heh. When trying to leave Gold Saucer with the keystone, Cloud is intercepted by a staff member. StaffExcuse me, sir.I'm sorry. The Tram is out of order right now. Cloud...so? StaffI'm really sorry!I'm afraid you won't be able to leave until it's fully repaired. If Cait Sith is not in the party, he bounces up to join Cloud now. Cait SithWhat's wrong? Cloud explains. Cait SithToo bad. It happens, though.I know! Let's stay at the hotel! They know me here. I'll go talk to them. StaffI will let you know once the repairs are completed. At the hotel, the entire team gathers in the lobby. Cait SithWe don't usually get the chance to be together like this, huh?Cloud, how 'bout it? Can you tell us what's happened so far?I don't really know what's goin' on because I wasn't here in the beginning. CidYeah! I'm all for it! VincentGood idea. BarretI been here since the beginnin', an' I still don't know what the hell's goin' on either.Cloud, the hell's goin' on? C'mon, tell us! Cloud- I'm tired...- All right, I'll give it a shot...
I'm tired... CidAll we have to do now is sleep! You're still young! What're you complaining about?
All right, I'll give it a shot... Nothing special happens.
CloudPhew...We are going after Sephiroth.Sephiroth must be in search of the Promised Land. CidThe Promised Land? CloudA land full of Mako energy. ...or at least that's what the Shinra believe.I don't know if it actually exists. AerithThe Cetras return to the Promised Land. A land that promises boundless happiness. BarretCetra? That some kinda disease? AerithThat's what the Ancients call themselves.Hey, didn't you listen to the elders at Cosmo Canyon? Barret scratches his head. Aerith...You don't 'know' where the Promised Land of the Ancients is.You search and travel, until you feel it. Like you just know, '...this is the Promised Land.' CloudAerith... can you feel it too? AerithI think so. TifaSo Sephiroth is traveling the world because he's searching for the Promised Land? Is that it? AerithThat, and one other thing he's searching for. CloudThe Black Materia... Cait SithI heard from Dio that a man in a Black Cape was lookin' for the Black Materia. TifaI don't even know what the Black Cape is...How many men with Black Capes and number tattoos are there? Nanaki...you know, of course... My tattoo is number 13. CloudHow did you get that tattoo? Nanaki...Hojo put it on me. Everything else is just war scars, but the number was done by Hojo. TifaSo there are at least 13!? Aerith...You know......I think Hojo did something to those men in the Black Capes.But I don't know what it has to do with Sephiroth though...That's why I think we should just go after Sephiroth himself. BarretYeah, me too! It's all just too damn confusin'. AerithAnd...I'm sorry, forget it!I think I'm tired. I'm going to bed now. She runs upstairs. Cait SithWhat was that, all of a sudden!? YuffieWhat!? That's it? I'm goin' to bed! She runs off after Aerith. Cait SithIs that all? How 'bout the Black Materia? CloudYou wouldn't understand even if I told you. BarretNow all we gotta do is take action! We're startin' tomorrow!! He runs upstairs. NanakiCloud...I'm number 13. Am I going to go mad too? TifaI don't know what Hojo did to you, but you've been all right so far, right? NanakiBut... TifaBe strong. NanakiBut, I... TifaStop it, Nanaki! Be strong! CloudTifa? TifaYou're not the only one who's worried! Cait SithI don't know what's goin' on, but we're in a bad situation... VincentHey Cid, let's go back to our rooms. Cid...zzzz... zzzz... Cloud retires to his room. There comes a knock on the door. [Aerith enters.][Tifa enters.][Yuffie enters.][Barret enters.]

Don't take me for a fool AerithHey...a little touchy, aren't we?
Well, not a real one... AerithNo, just a mixed-up kid...
AerithOh well, come on let's go... She runs around behind him and starts pushing him out of the room. CloudHey! Upon arriving together at the Station... ManTonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square! AerithCome on, let's go. The two of them head for Event Square, where they are greeted immediately. ManCongratulations!!You are our 100th couple today!!You two will be the leads in tonight's show!!!! CloudWha? ManOh, now, it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.Come this way. CloudH, hey! AerithThis sounds like fun. Come on Cloud, let's do it. What will become of her?Just then, the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!! KnightOh...... You must be the legendary hero...Alfred! Cloud shakes his head, staring out at the audience. Talk to the one who can help you......Who will you talk to? Cloud- The knight- The wizard
The knight KnightI am...a lowly...knight. How...can I help you? Cloud- Defeat the Evil Dragon King- Defeat the King

I have not harmed the Princess... I have been expecting...you! AerithPlease help me...Legendary hero!psst...... like that? EDKGaaaaaah! Here I come, Legendary hero...Alfred!I already know...your name! KnightUuuuuuurrrrgghh! He throws himself at the dragon king, but gets knocked out. EDKGaaaaaaaaaaaahh! What now...Legendary hero!?
